long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickTabs is a comprehensive Chrome extension designed to streamline and enhance your tab management experience. With its intuitive interface, QuickTabs allows you to effortlessly pin and unpin tabs, ensuring that your most important pages are always within reach. You can easily bookmark any tab for future reference, close tabs you're no longer using, and navigate between tabs across all open Chrome windows, saving you time and effort.

One of the standout features of QuickTabs is its reminder system, which notifies you if a tab has been inactive for more than three days, helping you keep your workspace organized by identifying tabs that might no longer be relevant. QuickTabs also groups tabs by domain, making it easier to manage multiple tabs from the same website. This extension not only helps in maintaining a clutter-free browser but also optimizes your workflow by providing quick access to essential tools right at your fingertips. Whether you're a power user managing dozens of tabs or someone who just wants a cleaner browsing experience, QuickTabs is designed to make your life easier.
